00045 int CommandReaddir::run() {
00046   uint64_t handle;
00047   int error;
00048   std::vector<struct DirEntry> listing;
00049 
00050   if (m_args.size() != 1) {
00051     cerr << "Wrong number of arguments.  Type 'help' for usage." << endl;
00052     return -1;
00053   }
00054 
00055   if (m_args[0].second != "") {
00056     cerr << "Invalid character '=' in argument." << endl;
00057     return -1;
00058   }
00059 
00060   if (!Util::get_handle(m_args[0].first, &handle))
00061     return -1;
00062 
00063   if ((error = m_session->readdir(handle, listing)) == Error::OK) {
00064     struct LtDirEntry ascending;
00065     sort(listing.begin(), listing.end(), ascending);
00066     for (size_t i=0; i<listing.size(); i++) {
00067       if (listing[i].is_dir)
00068         cout << "(dir) ";
00069       else
00070         cout << "      ";
00071       cout << listing[i].name << endl;
00072     }
00073   }
00074 
00075   return error;
00076 }
